text: Nancun Wanbo station (), formly named as Hezhuang station (), is a station of Line 7 on the Guangzhou Metro. The station is situated under Hanxi Avenue East (), located in Panyu District, Guangzhou. It began operations on 28 December 2016. ==Station layout== {|table border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=3 |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;" width=50 valign=top|G |style="border- top:solid 1px gray;" width=120 valign=top|Street level |style="border- top:solid 1px gray;" width=450 valign=top|Exit |- |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;" valign=top width=50|L1 |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;" valign=top width=100|Commerce |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;" valign=top width=450|Commercial Center (Under construction) |- |style="border- bottom:solid 1px gray; border-top:solid 1px gray;" valign=top width=50 rowspan=2|L2 Concourse |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray; border-top:solid 1px gray;" valign=top width=100|Lobby |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray; border- top:solid 1px gray;" valign=top width=450|Customer Service, Vending machines |- |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray; border-top:solid 1px gray;" valign=top width=100|- |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray; border-top:solid 1px gray;" valign=top width=450|Commercial Center (Under Construction) |- |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" rowspan=3 valign=top|L3 Platforms |Platform | towards Guangzhou South Railway Station (Hanxi Changlong) |- |style="border-right:solid 2px black;border-left:solid 2px black;border-top:solid 2px black;border-bottom:solid 2px black;text- align:center;" colspan=2|Island platform, doors will open on the left |- |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;"|Platform |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;"| towards Higher Education Mega Center South (Yuangang) |} Platform 1 ==Exits== {| class="wikitable" ! style="width:70px" colspan="2" | Exit number !
